title: About Us
subtitle: Our Agriculture Waste Management platform helps farmers and communities turn agricultural residues into valuable resources. From composting to biomass energy, we bridge the gap between sustainable practices and practical solutions.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.body: To empower farmers and rural communities by providing them with easy access to sustainable waste management solutions, reducing environmental pollution, and improving income opportunities.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.body: A future where no agricultural waste is left unmanaged— every residue is transformed into compost, energy, or raw material, creating a cleaner, greener, and more profitable ecosystem.

smart.title: Smart Processes
smart.description: Find the best waste management process tailored to your waste type, quantity, and available resources.

market.title: Farmer Marketplace
market.description: Connect with buyers and sellers to trade compost, biomass, manure, and other agri by-products directly.

eco.title: Eco-Friendly Solutions
eco.description: Reduce burning and dumping by adopting eco-friendly alternatives like composting, mulching, and biogas.

sustain.title: Sustainability Impact
sustain.description: Together, we’re reducing pollution, improving soil fertility, and contributing to a sustainable future for agriculture.

cta.title: Join Our Mission
cta.subtitle: Whether you’re a farmer, entrepreneur, or eco-conscious citizen, be a part of the change. Explore processes, trade resources, and help build a greener tomorrow.
